recommended_degree: Statistik, Teknik Informatika, Manajemen Pendidikan, Teknik Industri (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description: As a Quality Assurance Intern, you will support the QA team with basic administrative and monitoring tasks related to academic and institutional quality processes. Your responsibilities include helping collect and organize documents, assisting with data entry for surveys or reports, and supporting the preparation of materials for audits or evaluations. You may also assist in tracking submission deadlines, compiling feedback from students or departments, and updating simple quality assurance records. Throughout your internship, you are expected to maintain accuracy, follow established procedures, and perform light tasks assigned by the QA team to support the daily quality assurance activities.
